name: procrastinated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
procrastinate
to keep delaying something that must be done, often because it is unpleasant or boring: I know I've got to deal with the problem at some point - I'm just procrastinating. Synonym
dilly-dally old-fashioned informal
